data.title: Sons of Camelot: The Fate of an American Dynasty
data.meta_description: New York: William Morrow, 2004. 1st Edition. Hardcover. Sons of Camelot is the compelling story of the Kennedy sons and grandsons in the aftermath of the assassination of President John F. Kennedy. It is the most intimate biography ever written about the Kennedys, with the cooperation of family and friends at a moment when they are ready to talk with insight and depth about their lives. No Flaws or Blemishes but minor
data.text:
New York: William Morrow, 2004. 1st Edition. Hardcover.

Sons of Camelot is the compelling story of the Kennedy sons and grandsons in the aftermath of the assassination of President John F. Kennedy. It is the most intimate biography ever written about the Kennedys, with the cooperation of family and friends at a moment when they are ready to talk with insight and depth about their lives. No Flaws or Blemishes but minor spotting on lower edge.

Near Fine / Near Fine. Item #012469

ISBN: 9780066209654
